column4: I seem to have broken ubuntu. When I try to boot up my laptop it gets stuck after it displays "* Running local boot scripts (/etc/rc.local) [ OK ]".   It never gets to the desktop.
for some reason Ubuntu puts the login: before * Running local boot scripts (/etc/rc.local) [ OK ]
your at the login prompt you just don't know it
type your username and password and I bet you login
